t: Calzedonia launched swimwear collection on Amazon just in time for summer | Fox News
s: 5 days ago - Prepare for beach and pool weather with a new one-piece swimsuit, bikini or cover-up from the fashion brand Calzedonia.

t: In A Survey, Amazon Stands Out As Minnesota's Most Trusted Retail Brand
s: And now a new survey from Clarify Capital points out that *this* national retailer (which Minnesota Monthly says is one of the 50 largest employers in Minnesota) now operates 11 different facilities in Minnesota while retaining its title as America's most trusted retail brand.

t: Amazon IP Accelerator: Trademark support for your brand
s: Amazon IP Accelerator connects you with a network of vetted legal service providers that offer trademark support and other intellectual-property services.

t: BASDEHEN Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Chenfeng Store | CPSC.gov
s: Consumers should immediately stop using these faucets and contact Chenfeng Store about disposal and a refund. Consumers will need to provide a photograph of disposal to receive the refund. Amazon is contacting all known purchasers directly.Until these faucets can be replaced, consumers should ...
